question: Please provide a detailed summary of the 2017 IEEE paper titled “Quantum-Neural Hybrid Backpropagation for Consumer Sentiment Forecasting” authored by Dr. Alan Weissman from the University of Oslo, including the dataset used, evaluation metrics, and the key mathematical contribution. answer: Short answer up front: I couldn’t find any record of a 2017 IEEE paper titled “Quantum-Neural Hybrid Backpropagation for Consumer Sentiment Forecasting” by Dr. Alan Weissman (University of Oslo) in IEEE Xplore, Google Scholar, arXiv, or other major publishers. I searched widely across the usual academic indexes and the literature on hybrid quantum–classical neural methods and sentiment/financial forecasting; there are many papers on hybrid quantum–classical networks and on quantum-inspired methods for forecasting, but no match for that exact title, author, year, or DOI.
